name: Polar Planets
description:
In Polar Planets you play as an astro-engineer trying to survive on two merged planets, with the ability to switch between which planet and inhabitants you are viewing using your gadget! 

With just you and your gun alone , along with the help of some useful power-ups, how long can you survive?

This game was made in under a week for the JTA GameJam with a team of two developers and an artist!

All assets were made by us during the jam.
